name: travelsocial-fullstack
description: TravelSocial - Full-stack application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../TravelSocial-featuristic && npm install
scripts.test-db: cd backend && node -e "require('./db')().then(() => console.log('✅ Database connected successfully!')).catch(err => console.error('❌ Database connection failed:', err.message))"
